locations.title: Flying J Travel Center
locations.content: Flying J Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ I really can't convey just how nice it is to walk inside and when you see the large bathrooms and shower facilities, the wonderful seating area for relaxing. It's just inviting.

After packing up our apartment and two days down the road on our cross country move, we were searching desperately for a rest stop with showers open to the public. We finally found a review (of a different truck stop) mentioning the Flying ‚Ä¶

I came here on a Thursday evening just to use the shower facilities. We originally went to the Husky travel center in Saint Catherine's because it was closest, but they wouldn't allow showers for anyone other than truck drivers. We have ‚Ä¶

I just wanted to share with all of you this remarkable experience in this travel Center , today 10/23/20 I was waiting for a shower . The cleaning person was out for lunch and guess what the manager saw me standing around waiting for a ‚Ä¶

Lots of parking, very clean restrooms and shower rooms. They got that new coffee machine, bean to cup, awesome coffee. I actually like it more than Tim Hortons üòâ.  This Flying J is my favorite stop before crossing to the USA and after ‚Ä¶
Wait for shower was rather too long..plus they have no email system so if you want Ace only fax..staff were not very friendly..all in all needs improvement

‚Ä¶ diesel islands. Clean. Loads of parking spaces. Great food and fast friendly service. The washrooms and shower facilities,  are also well maintained. I highly recommend this location. By the way... I had the chicken tenders... Mmm, mmm, ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ only problem I have with this flying j is you can't brush your teeth. You can wash your hands take a shower but you can't brush your teeth cause people are complaining. I ask for a shower stall but nope they are reserved for showers only. ‚Ä¶
Great service, shower is roomy and very clean. Lounge is spacious.
The shower not working

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice place. Great pool. We had some issues with our breaker tripping alot so we had to mindful of our power usage but it was a hot couple of days. Did some laundry and was happy with the machines. Bathrooms were fine. Location is amazing. ‚Ä¶

We were tent camping over a long weekend and I can say it's one of the great camping we've been. The soil was perfect for tenting, the sanitary block was always very clean and everyone there was respectful. There's a lot of birds in the ‚Ä¶

Stayed here for two nights on the Campground. Campground is clean and tidy but washrooms and showers need some renovation and some water pressure, even if they were clean too. Campsites are small, so there is not much privacy. ‚Ä¶

Super friendly and accommodating. You'll feel like you're transported back to '95 and it's wonderful. It's a nice, family friendly, quiet park with clean accommodations. The staff and ownership are also great and easy to deal with.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ offer any support. The owners wife said they already did the work to bury a cable prior to the install date, however when the internet tech showed up, he said they did not do that. Also, the shower water was cold sometimes when I used them.
‚Ä¶ The bathrooms were very clean, and they even had a small heated bathroom with a shower in the laundry room. ‚Ä¶

There was absolutely no hot water in the washrooms. My family had gone here for 4 nights and not once was there hot water to shower with so we had ice cold showers. We called the office a few times and they just told us we had to let the ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ There are a few seasonal pitches but plenty of room for tourers. There is a large central toilet and shower block. My husband said having a shower there was the worst experience in years.  The cubicles are small and badly designed. The ‚Ä¶

This really is a family friendly park. Shower and laundry facilities are clean and the pool is well maintained. Staff are friendly and easy to find. Propane tank fill and firewood is available. Camping in the the Honeymoon Capital? Why not?

This is really nice campground with very friendly, kind staff who go out of their way to accommodate the campers. There are huge bathroom/ shower facilities that are kept very clean.  The transit to Niagra Falls stops right out front.
Camped in a 35‚Äù motorhome. We are self-contained so cannot comment on restrooms/shower facilities. ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: For most part was happy with Veterans Memorial Park. Went there for a family baby shower. There were about 30 people in our party, most stayed at the shelter. The shelters were very clean, labeled well, plenty of trash cans near each ‚Ä¶
Held my daughter's baby shower here. We all had a wonderful time!

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ On-site washroom.and shower facilities were clean and easy to access and use. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ If you plan to take a shower before changing back to dry clothes, there are only two shower stalls inside the restroom/locker room. Additionally, you should bring your supplies like soap & shampoo. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the summer except now it was freezing cold air making those areas even colder. I also wish they forced people to shower as I saw 90% of the people not shower.  And I also wish they had a better system for people walking through in there ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ wait line for a slide! Hot tubs were both full and small. No chairs left, tiny over priced locker that most people struggle with. No room to swim. Not even much soap in the shower area. I wanted to leave, no refunds! What a waste of money!

‚Ä¶ are wearing their t-shirt or underwear shirt during swimming, SHOULD NOT ACCEPT ANY GUESTS ENTERING THE WATERPARK WITHOUT TAKING A SHOWER AT LEAST and wear proper swimming suits for men and women. It‚Äôs soooooo disgusting experience üëéüëéüëéüëéüëé ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ washroom and change room was clean and there are¬†staffs which constantly keeps cleaning and mopping the floors. When we went one of the showers were broken so there's quite a line up with only 1 working shower in the ladies' change room.

‚Ä¶ blast. Admission included complementary towel services. Water was warm. The only disadvantage is about limited shower. There is only 2 showers in the female change room which is not enough for that huge park. There is no family change room.
Really worth bringing your kids. Water is warm enough and they have an awesome structure to host their guests, including hot shower, towels, soap, etc.
‚Ä¶ There should be more shower rooms though, the waiting time was long to use the showers. Two rooms not enough when it's full.
‚Ä¶ There are just 2 private shower for women those for busy weekends are nothing! You can bring your own food and drink ‚Ä¶
